summary: Mod that add to the game new armor and weapon
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i61.tinypic.com/15i574k.png[/img][/center]

Finaly,after many hour of work with textures(a tons color variations),i'm finish this mod.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84226?]Spanish Translation
[/url]

Armor characteristics:

Armor - 31
Gloves - 12
Boots - 12
Hood - 10
Mask - 7

Material - Leather

Weapon characteristics:

Dragon Soul(1h) - 9
Dragon Soul Greate Sword(2h) - 17
-------------------------------------------------
Location:

Ritual Stone
---------------------------------------------

[color=red]
UPDATE 1.1
Add correct 1st model
add upgrades for armor and weapon

UPDATE 1.2
Add missing alpha mask for armor
add support for beast race's
Fixed hood
[/color]
